statements.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BussinessCode='01' ,DE_DepositNum as CertificateNum ,DE_DepositAccount as RegulatoryAccount ,DE_FirmName as FirmName ,DE_DepositType as TradeType ,DE_DepositAmount as TradeFundAmount , DE_PurchaserName as TradeObject , DE_PurchaserID as TradeMark ,DE_ProjectCode as ProjectCode FROM JG_Deposit j left join UserInfo u on j.DE_BankTellerID=u.UserCode WHERE (DE_BusinessCode='03' OR DE_DepositState='已冲正') and (datediff(day,DE_DepositTime ,#Time#)=0 OR datediff(day,DE_ReverseTime ,#Time#)=0) union select BussinessCode='03' ,DE_DepositNum as CertificateNum ,DE_DepositAccount as RegulatoryAccount ,DE_FirmName as FirmName ,DE_DepositType as TradeType ,DE_DepositAmount as TradeFundAmount ,u.UserName as TradeObject ,DE_BankTellerID as TradeMark ,DE_ProjectCode as ProjectCode FROM JG_Deposit j left join UserInfo u on j.DE_BankTellerID=u.UserCode WHERE DE_BusinessCode='06' and (datediff(day,DE_DepositTime ,#Time#)=0 OR datediff(day,DE_ReverseTime ,#Time#)=0) union
SELECT BussinessCode='02' ,PA_PaymentID as CertificateNum ,PA_PayAccount as RegulatoryAccount ,PA_FirmName as FirmName ,TradeType='00' ,PA_PaymentAmount as TradeFundAmount , PA_ReceiverName as TradeObject , PA_ReceiverAccount as TradeMark ,PA_ProjectCode as ProjectCode FROM JG_Payment j left join UserInfo u on j.PA_BankTellerID=u.UserCode WHERE (PA_BusinessCode='05' or PA_PayState='已冲正') and (datediff(day,PA_PaymentTime ,#Time#)=0 OR datediff(day,PA_ReverseTime ,#Time#)=0 )
union
SELECT BussinessCode='03' ,PA_PaymentID as CertificateNum ,PA_PayAccount as RegulatoryAccount ,PA_PayName as FirmName ,TradeType='00' ,PA_PaymentAmount as TradeFundAmount ,u.UserName as TradeObject ,PA_BankTellerID as TradeMark ,PA_ProjectCode as ProjectCode FROM JG_Payment j left join UserInfo u on j.PA_BankTellerID=u.UserCode WHERE PA_BusinessCode='06' and (datediff(day,PA_PaymentTime ,#Time#)=0 OR datediff(day,PA_ReverseTime ,#Time#)=0 )
union
SELECT BussinessCode='04' ,s.SI_CertificateNum as CertificateNum ,s.SI_AccountNum as RegulatoryAccount ,j.AM_CorpName as FirmName ,TradeType='60' ,s.SI_Money as TradeFundAmount ,u.UserName as TradeObject ,s.SI_BankTellerID as TradeMark ,j.AM_ProjectCode as ProjectCode FROM (JG_AccountManage j left join SeasonInterest s on j.AM_ID=s.SI_ID) left join UserInfo u on s.SI_BankTellerID=u.UserCode WHERE datediff(day,SI_Time ,#Time#)=0 and s.SI_CertificateNum is not null
union
SELECT BussinessCode='05' ,RT_PaymentID as CertificateNum ,RT_AccountName as RegulatoryAccount ,j.AM_CorpName as FirmName ,TradeType='70' ,RT_RefundAmount as TradeFundAmount ,u.UserName as TradeObject ,RT_AccountTeller as TradeMark ,j.AM_ProjectCode as ProjectCode from (RefundTrade r left join UserInfo u on r.RT_AccountTeller=u.UserCode) left join JG_AccountManage j on j.AM_ID=r.RT_AccountID where datediff(day,RT_RefundTime ,#Time#)=0 ) a order by FirmName ,RegulatoryAccount

select s.SI_AccountNum as RegulatoryAccount,SI_Time as Time,SI_Memo as Instruction, SI_BankSerialNumber as BankSerialNumber,SI_Money as TradeFundAmount,s.SI_BankTellerID as TradeMark, u.UserName as TradeObject,a.AM_ProjectCode as ProjectCode from SeasonInterest s left join JG_AccountManage a on s.SI_ID=a.AM_ID left join UserInfo u on s.SI_BankTellerID=u.UserCode where SI_State='Y'
